name: RNG: Run N Gun
description:
Made for the 2020 GMTK GameJam in 48 hours  with the theme: "Out of Control".

In RNG: Run N Gun you control Lil' Dice, a small fella that has no control over which guns he will use. Whenever you run out of ammo for your current gun, you get a new randomized gun. These heckin Charmeleons just won't stop coming, so you have to get rid of as many of them as possible to get higher scores. But be careful, because the rules are constantly changing.

Left Mouse Button - Shoot
Right Mouse Button - Dodge
WASD - Move

Alexandre Magno (@alexandremth): Code and Design

Pedro Porto (@pppremazzi): Art (Scenery and characters) and Design

Marcos Kenji (@marcosuchima): Art (Weapons and UI) and Design

Music: Bensound.com
SFX: soundbible.com
